code: import{useContext}from'react';import{CurrentUserContext}from'../contexts/CurrentUserContext';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Card(props){var currentUser=useContext(CurrentUserContext);var isOwn=props.owner._id===currentUser._id;var cardDeleteButtonClassName="element__delete ".concat(isOwn?'element__delete-active':'');var isLiked=props.likes.some(function(i){return i._id===currentUser._id;});var cardLikeButtonClassName="element__like ".concat(isLiked?'element__like_type_active':'');function handleOnCardClick(){props.onCardClick(props);}function handleLikeClick(){props.onCardLike(props);}function handleDeleteClick(){props.onCardDelete(props);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"element",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"element__foto",src:props.link,alt:props.name,onClick:handleOnCardClick}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"element__place",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"element__place-name",children:props.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"element__like-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:cardLikeButtonClassName,onClick:handleLikeClick}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"element__amount-likes",children:props.likes.length})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:cardDeleteButtonClassName,onClick:handleDeleteClick})]})});}export default Card;
